abstract: Bank of America is primed to assume all debt of the former Countrywide Financial, independent research firm CreditSights said, a move that would alleviate worries of Countrywide bondholders.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America is primed to assume all debt of the former Countrywide Financial, independent research firm CreditSights said, a move that would alleviate worries of Countrywide bondholders.

headline.main: Bank of America May Assume All Countrywide Debt, Analyst Says
